name: LAMINAR AVIATION, INC.
about: Laminar Aviation, Inc. is a premier flight school based in Subic Bay, Philippines, with over 20 years of experience in the aviation industry. Established to provide high-quality and safe flight training, Laminar Aviation offers programs for private pilots, commercial pilots, and flight instructors. Our fleet includes Cessna 172, 152, 150, and Piper Seneca II aircraft, along with a Redbird MCX flight simulator. Committed to safety and quality, our training programs are led by CAAP-certified ground and flight instructors and comply with the highest industry standards. With a friendly and family-oriented environment, we transform passion into profession, preparing aspiring pilots for successful careers globally. Join us at Subic International Airport to start your aviation journey.
services:
["PRIVATE PILOT COURSE (PPL)
COMMERCIAL PILOT COURSE (CPL)
INSTRUMENT RATING COURSE (IR)
FLIGHT INSTRUCTOR COURSE (FI)
FLIGHT INSTRUCTOR REFRESHER COURSE (FIRC)"]
